00044                 JMP_THIS(0x4CA670);

00046         static bool FindThisOwnerAndProduct(HouseClass *pHouse, TechnoTypeClass *pItem)
00047         {
00048                 for(int i = 0; i < Array->Count; ++i) {
00049                         FactoryClass *Fact = Array->GetItem(i);
00050                         if(Fact->Owner == pHouse) {
00051                                 if(Fact->CountQueued(pItem) > 0) {
00052                                         return true;
00053                                 }
00054                         }
00055                 }
00056                 return false;
00057         }
00058

00060         //===========================================================================
00061         //===== Properties ==========================================================
00062         //===========================================================================
00063         
00064         PROPERTY(int,                ProductionStatus); // hardcoded to be 54 steps (so cameo clock should be 54 frames)
00065         PROPERTY(bool,               unknown_bool_28);
00066         PROPERTY_STRUCT(TimerStruct,        ProductionTimer);
00067         PROPERTY(DWORD,              ProductionRemainingFrames);

00072         PROPERTY(bool,               IsDifferent);      //Not sure what this means.

00074         PROPERTY(int,                OriginalBalance);
